title: Jazz Willisau:  Max Nagl, Otto Lechner, Acci Bradley-Jones
description: White poster with text from top to bottom spelled out in purple dots and splotches, (possibly created using fingertips). Text reads: "Jazz in Willisau 26 Jan. '07, 20.30h im Foroom, Mac Nagls, Otto Lechnier, Acci Bradley Jones, bass." 2007: Bosch Siebdruck Bosch AG Stans
name: Poster
